title: High Pressure Shower Heads, Hard Water Filter Shower Head with Shower Stand, 4 Mode Handheld Powerful Shower Head with Pause Switch,Massage Showerhead with 1.5M Shower Hose for Hard Water, Dark Gray
features: FILTERED SHOWER HEAD: This shower pro head comes with a powerful multi-stage filtration system featuring a variety of bead-filtering mineral stone balls to effectively purify and filter your shower water. This hard water filter shower head effectively removes chlorine and other harmful substances from the water, protects you and your family's skin and hair, and provides you with a healthy and comfortable showering experience.

HIGH PRESSURE SHOWER HEADS: The hard water filter shower head can be highly pressurized to solve the disadvantage of insufficient water pressure. The internal space of the shower head is well-structured and the water outlets are evenly distributed. The filter showerhead's advanced technical design ensures that all nozzles deliver a balanced amount of water, and the powerful water pressure gently relieves your tired body in just a few minutes.

4 MODES SHOWER HEAD: The high pressure shower heads have 4 adjustable modes, including a powerful shock mode that massages and soothes your body, a spray mode that protects your skin without density, and a blend mode that lets you enjoy the effect of rainwater enveloping you. Simply press the button on the high-pressure shower head to switch easily. Removable shower head supports you to remove the silicone brushes for your convenience.

HIGH-QUALITY MATERIAL: This handheld pressurized showerhead is made of durable, eco-friendly, chrome-plated ABS, and the exterior is coated with a multi-layer baked-on paint that is anti-corrosive, rust-resistant and wear-resistant. Our power shower head is more powerful than a normal shower head. Equipped with a liquid silicone massage strip, it provides SPA-level pleasure and makes bathing more enjoyable.

WITH SHOWER HOSE AND SHOWER HOLDER: The shower filter head for hard water comes with a 1.5m shower hose and a non-porous shower holder, easy to install on the bathroom wall. Upgraded shower hose with high temperature and tear resistance. The filter shower head with pause switch can be adjusted through 90° for a multi-directional shower effect. If you have any questions about our shower head, please do not hesitate to contact our customer service department.

【Note】The filter element is already installed in the shower head and no secondary installation is required.The main map is the filter perspective. Please check the details page for the actual product map.PLEASE DO NOT USE THIS SHOWER HEAD ON THE ELECTRIC SHOWER.The color of the complimentary accessories (hose and shower head holder) will be randomly selected and cannot be specified. Thank you for your understanding!
